Text: This works...just follow the instructions in the "How to Install and Activate" folder. Install the update that pops up. Copy and paste the email address/product key both times. Install the codec pack too. Change settings in Windows Firewall with Advanced Security outbound rules under Media Center Extenders to allow. And you're good to go.
Thanks!  Just trying to get the hang of it now.
this shit used to be free. god dman jews.
Is it safe to download the update or not?
Update is safe and recommended. Just use same email and key provided with the Activator. +1
This also works with version 2.3 :) Thanks ManyAlias
